definition: all over the place/everywhere and all directions
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
see 眼觀四面，耳聽八方|眼观四面，耳听八方[yan3 guan1 si4 mian4 , er3 ting1 ba1 fang1]
pinyin: yan3 guan1 si4 chu4 , er3 ting1 ba1 fang1

sentences.english: Problem with Orphans A gang of orphans scoured the city for scraps to live on.
sentences.chinese: 孤兒問題一羣孤兒在城裏四處搜索殘羹剩飯混時度日。

sentences.english: Four people enter looking around in a curios way.
sentences.chinese: 有四個人走了進來，好奇的四處張望。

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum princess is forced to taking imperial jade seal, abscond everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 菊花公主被迫帶着玉璽，四處逃亡。

sentences.english: The smoke grew thicker and I could see flames all around.
sentences.chinese: 煙霧越來越濃，四處火舌沖天。

sentences.english: My legs felt weak after a day of running around.
sentences.chinese: 一整天四處奔走之後我的腿軟了。

sentences.english: In fact, sleepwalkers can sustain injuries if they continue to walk around.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，如果夢遊者繼續四處走的話會受到傷害。

sentences.english: It is risky to drive that old car around.
sentences.chinese: 開着那臺老爺車四處跑還挺危險的。

sentences.english: She was driven from pillar to post. Each person she spoke to was more unhelpful than the last.
sentences.chinese: 她四處奔走，和她談話的人一個不如一個有用處。

sentences.english: As the rover trundled around, its wheels kicked up soil rich in sulphate.
sentences.chinese: 當漫遊車四處工作時，車輪拖出了富含硫酸鹽的泥土。

sentences.english: I will ask around and see if anyone can help.
sentences.chinese: 我要四處打聽一下，看有沒有人能夠幫忙。

sentences.english: The lawn was dotted over with timber.
sentences.chinese: 草坪上四處散置着木材。

sentences.english: But right now, I want to focus on four of Kobe's on-court weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 不過現在，我只想說說科比在場上的四處弱點。

sentences.english: The enemy soldiers were fleeing in all directions, but few of them could escape.
sentences.chinese: 敵兵四處逃竄，但很少能逃出去。

sentences.english: You could actually get squeezed in by these hedges and you could be chased around.
sentences.chinese: 你很可能被那些樊籬夾扁的，被擠到四處亂跑的。

sentences.english: From the top to the hill on the island we could see the blue sea on every hand.
sentences.chinese: 從島上的山頂我們可以望見四處是茫茫碧海。

definition: from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
